item.title: Roblox: Muscle Legends Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Working Muscle Legends Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Muscle Legends
  • How to Get More Muscle Legends Codes
  • Muscle Legends Tips and Tricks
  • Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Muscle Legends
  • About the Muscle Legends Developers

In Muscle Legends, Roblox players must constantly train to become stronger and unlock new locations. To make this process easier, this article makes it simple for fans to redeem Muscle Legends codes, all of which can be found listed below. They provide valuable in-game rewards like gems, along with other nice boosts that should come in handy for both beginners and seasoned Roblox players alike.

Updated August 18, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are several codes currently available for Muscle Legends that offer a range of rewards, including Strength and Agility boosts as well as Gems. Each code can help you improve your character in different ways, depending on what you need. The list is kept up to date so you can easily find and redeem the latest rewards. Make sure to check back periodically, as new codes may appear and add even more bonuses.

Working Muscle Legends Codes

Muscle Legends receives regular updates to keep Roblox players engaged with new codes and game updates. While there are no inactive codes for this game currently, it's essential to act quickly, as it can change at any moment.

Codes Checked on August 18, 2025.

All Active Muscle Legends Codes

  • junglegym500 - 500 Strength boost.
  • epicmuscle20 - 2000 Strength boost.
  • ultimate250 - 250 Strength boost.
  • mightygems2500 - 2,500 Gems.
  • SkyAgility50 - 500 Agility boost.
  • SpaceGems50 - 5,000 Gems.
  • Speedy50 - 250 Agility boost.
  • SuperMuscle100 - 200 Strength boost.
  • SuperPunch100 - 100 Strength boost.
  • MegaLift50 - 250 Strength boost.
  • MillionWarriors - 1,500 Strength boost.
  • MuscleStorm50 - 1,500 Strength boost.
  • Launch250 - 250 Gems.
  • GalaxyCrystal50 - 5,000 Gems.
  • FrostGems10 - 10,000 Gems.
  • EpicReward500 - 500 Gems.

All Expired Muscle Legends Codes

There are currently no expired codes.

How to Redeem Codes in Muscle Legends

Redeeming codes in Muscle Legends is a very simple task, as it doesn't differ much from other Roblox games. Players can do it easily if they follow the instructions below:

  • Open Roblox and launch Muscle Legends .
  • Find the blue Twitter icon on the main screen of the game.
  • Click on this icon.
  • Enter the offered code in the field that says "Type Code Here."

How to Get More Muscle Legends Codes

To obtain more codes for Muscle Legends , Roblox players can find the game developer on Twitter. Additionally, this article is frequently updated, providing a reliable resource for players to stay up to date. By staying engaged and checking regularly, players can remain informed on the latest news and developments of the game.

Muscle Legends Tips and Tricks

To begin with, the codes provided above will give players a big boost in progress, after which players must level up themselves properly. It is very important to devote as much time to the treadmill as to other training. Avoid fights since, in the early stages, it can be difficult for players, as many very strong players can just kill everyone all the time, so avoiding fights in the early stages is an important key to success. Also, Rebirth will help players quickly get into new worlds and unlock more game content.

Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Muscle Legends

There are also many other great fighting games in Roblox that offer an interesting and unique gaming experience. For those looking to try something new, this article is here to help. Users can look below for a selection of the best games like Muscle Legends :

  • Arm Wrestling Simulator
  • One Punch Man: The Strongest
  • Strong Muscle Simulator
  • Strongman Simulator
  • +1 Strong Every Second

About the Muscle Legends Developers

Scriptbloxian Studios are very popular developers, and they have created quite a few cool games, including Muscle Legends . Their Roblox group has already gained more than 20 million members. Here is a complete list of games created by Scriptbloxian Studios:

  • Ninja Legends
  • Legends Of Speed
  • Ninja Legends 2
  • Drilling Simulator
  • Muscle Legends

item.title: Revolution Idle Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Revolution Idle is an idle game that is perfect for relaxing and having some fun. It has no plot or colorful interface with characters; just a few buttons to speed up the earning of game currency. In addition, you can buy certain upgrades, game speed-up time, and skins for the circles that display the process of earning currency.

Although the game is very simple in its concept and interface, it is very addictive. It will be even more interesting to play if you redeem Revolution Idle codes because they will bring you free rewards that will further accelerate your progress.

Updated August 18, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are a variety of codes currently available in Revolution Idle , offering rewards like Souls and Time Flux boosts. These can help you gather resources faster and enhance your progress in the game. Some codes provide longer boost durations, while others give a larger amount of Souls to use as needed. The list is updated regularly, so it’s worth checking back for new rewards and opportunities.

All Revolution Idle Codes

Working Revolution Idle Codes

  • BOOTY500SOULS - Enter this code to get 1000 Souls. (NEW)
  • CHRONORIUM - Enter this code to get Time Flux for 15 minutes. (NEW)
  • BOOTY - Enter this code to get 500 Souls and Time Flux for 15 minutes. (NEW)
  • MOREFLUX25 - Enter this code to get Time Flux for 30 minutes.
  • INEEDSOULS25 - Enter this code to get 1000 Souls and Time Flux for 30 minutes.
  • SWEETUNITY25 - Enter this code to get 500 Souls and Time Flux for 15 minutes.
  • SANTASOULS - Enter this code to get 2.000 Souls.
  • revo1000 - Enter this code to get 1.000 Souls.
  • moreflux2411 - Enter this code to get Time Flux for 30 minutes.
  • whynotboth2411 - Enter this code to get 500 Souls and Time Flux for 15 minutes.

Expired Revolution Idle Codes

  • freesouls2411 - Enter this code to get 1.000 Souls.
  • frenzyrevo - Enter this code to get 1.000 Souls.
  • spinfaster - Enter this code to get Time Flux for 30 minutes.

The developers of Revolution Idle created the game so that there was nothing superfluous in it, but it still has several elements besides the idle component. One of them is Time Flux, which accelerates earnings by 2 or 3 times. The game also has Souls, a premium currency that can be bought for real money or obtained by completing achievements. It can be spent on some upgrades and lap skins. Fortunately, you can get Souls and Time Flux for free if you redeem Revolution Idle codes.

How to Redeem Codes in Revolution Idle

Usually, it is easier to redeem a code in Roblox games, but thankfully, in Revolution Idle there the process is quite easy as well. To do this, you need to go to the Shop, which can always be done from the main screen. This option will not be unlocked immediately, but you just need to play for a few minutes. If you need help, we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Revolution Idle .

  • Pay attention to the right side of the game interface. Click the Shop button above Credits. If it's not already blocked, just keep playing.
  • In the Shop window in the upper left corner of the screen, click the Add a code button.
  • In the white box, paste the code from the list of working codes and click Add.

Most codes have a validity period. Redeem them before this period expires to receive your rewards.

How to Get More Revolution Idle Codes

Just like with other mobile games, if you would like to get more new codes, please bookmark this page in your browser as we update it every month. To do this, just use the keyboard shortcut Ctrl + D.

Revolution Idle is available on PC and mobile devices.

item.title: Best Games That Offended So Many People
item.description:
Gaming is a medium that has undergone significant transformations over the years. There was a time when violence and lewd content were frowned upon in video games, only for these two elements to become oh-so-prevalent in some of the best video games fans can enjoy today.

Some games have content so questionable that they offend almost everyone, especially when they make the news and outrage the general public. Some of these offenses may seem tame by modern standards, while others feel justified to an extent.

Doom

The Violence Didn't Sit Right With Many

3 Images
3 Images
Doom (1993)
8 /10
9.0 /10
Released
December 10, 1993

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Strong Language
Powered by

Doom is one of the grandaddies of PC gaming, and it helped the first-person shooter (FPS) genre attain a foothold in the industry. It also outraged adults with its depiction of hell and the brutal violence that ensues as players rip and tear through their foes.

The game sparked a global discussion, and it didn't help that the perpetrators of the infamous Columbine High School Massacre were obsessed with this game. Thankfully, despite this outrage, Doom has continued to stand strong as one of the greatest video games and one of the most influential as well.

Manhunt

Even People Working At Rockstar Were Offended

Manhunt
7.8 /10
Released
November 18, 2003

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Strong Language
Powered by

Manhunt forces players to take part in a snuff film where they're incentivized to be as brutal as possible with their killings. Players could use a bevy of objects and use them to charge up stealth kills, with max charge leading to an elaborate and violent animation where protagonist James Earl Cash brutalizes his enemies before killing them.

Given Rockstar's infamous reputation among media outlets, it's easy to see why news channels jumped at the chance to decry this game's glorification of violence. However, in a first for the company, Manhunt was so depraved that even some of the developers at Rockstar pushed back against the game's violent content. It takes something special for a video game to be so disturbing that it upsets the very people working on it.

Mortal Kombat

The Controversy Led To The Creation Of The ESRB System

6 Images
6 Images
Mortal Kombat (1992)
7.5 /10
Released
October 6, 1992

WHERE TO PLAY

PHYSICAL

ESRB
m
Powered by

The original Mortal Kombat 's release was a landmark event in the video game industry for a number of reasons. Not only did it mark the debut of one of the most iconic fighting games ever made, but it also sparked a debate about the need for censorship in video games.

What many people saw as depraved violence (especially when it came to the fatalities) in Mortal Kombat eventually led to the rise of the ESRB system, whose purpose was to ensure that people were aware of the content in the games they were purchasing for their children. This negative PR ended up turning Mortal Kombat into a legendary franchise that has made waves in the industry with each entry.

Postal 2

The Over-the-Top Violence Offended Many

5 Images
5 Images
Postal 2
FPS
Open-World
Systems
Released
April 13, 2003

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ // Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Mature Humor, Strong Language, Use of Drugs
Powered by

Postal 2 is one of the most controversial video games ever made. The idea of partaking in violent action and terrorizing the residents of a small town wasn't as amusing for some people when they saw how depraved the protagonist could get. Brutal animal cruelty and desecration of dead bodies were just a few of the many acts in the game that shocked many people.

This led to Postal 2 becoming a controversial game. Ironically enough, the debate that it sparked brought more eyes to this title than ever before. The fact that this game is getting a remaster makes it clear that Postal 2 's penchant to offend people worked in its favor, and it has gained popularity from its notorious reputation.

Bully

Controlling High School Students In Violent Escapades

Bully
9.2 /10
Released
October 17, 2006

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T For Teen due to Crude Humor, Language, Sexual Themes, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco, Violence
Powered by

Rockstar Games has often been an easy developer to bash, and in 2006, news channels were salivating at the prospect of tearing apart a game from this studio that took place in a boarding school. Reports came in about how this game glorified bullying and let players partake in violent actions as an underage protagonist.

As one would expect, Rockstar rode this wave of controversy to new heights, and it only ensured that fans would have a great time with Bully . Players get invested in Jimmy Hopkins' story as they help him get revenge on the person who turned him into a laughingstock in Bullworth Academy.

Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas

The Hot Coffee Mod Generated Ridiculous Controversy

5 Images
5 Images
Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
112
8.6 /10
Released
October 26, 2004

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Use of Drugs
Powered by

The funniest thing about San Andreas ' controversy was how people were up in arms about content that wasn't even in the base game. Rather, it was the Hot Coffee mod that uncovered this content and turned CJ's adventures into one of the most diabolical media storms in gaming history. These game files involved an interactive minigame where players engaged in explicit acts.

So many people got offended that Rockstar had to take out this content from the game altogether to avoid the dreaded Adults Only rating. Thankfully, none of this marred San Andreas ' legacy, with many people considering it to be the best GTA game in the 3D Universe.

Punch-Out!!

The Racial Stereotypes In This Game Have Aged Poorly

6 Images
6 Images
Punch-Out!!
8.0 /10
Released
September 18, 1987

WHERE TO PLAY

PHYSICAL

Powered by

Punch-Out!! may be one of the most legendary video games of all time, but it has not aged well. The racial stereotypes personified by the game's cast of opponents are hard to swallow, especially in modern times.

It's easy to see why many people would be offended by the depictions of people from different countries in this title, with even the Wii version not doing much to dispel these stereotypes. That being said, fans still love this game and enjoy Mike Tyson's cameo in the original version, even if that had to be cut out later down the line.

Wolfenstein 3D

The Nazi Symbolism Made This FPS Extremely Controversial

3 Images
3 Images
Wolfenstein 3D
FPS
Systems
Released
May 5, 1992

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
m
Powered by

Wolfenstein 3D is one of the most iconic FPS games of all time. As it was released around a time when any violent video game would offend people, it's little wonder that it generated some controversy. However, other aspects of this game were so questionable that it had to be censored in many countries.

The Nazi imagery and Mecha-Hitler being the final boss all had to be changed for the German release. The fact that this game offended an entire country just helped Wolfenstein 3D become more of a classic, with fans loving the simple yet engaging gameplay.

item.title: Roblox: Golf Range Tycoon Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Golf Range Tycoon Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Golf Range Tycoon
  • How to Get More Golf Range Tycoon Codes

Golf Range Tycoon is a great business simulator where you will have to develop your own golf empire. Here you will have to build the entire golf course from scratch, and then serve customers to earn money for new improvements and expansions.

As in other Roblox games, in Golf Range Tycoon you can redeem codes that will bring you a lot of freebies and valuable rewards that will be especially useful from the very beginning. Redeeming codes won't take you much time or effort, and you'll get a decent amount of Cash in return, which will serve as a great start-up capital.

Updated August 18, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Right now, only one active code is available for Golf Range Tycoon , giving you 10,000 Cash. It’s worth redeeming while you can to boost your progress. New codes may appear later, so checking back regularly is a good idea. Updates can bring fresh rewards at any time.

All Golf Range Tycoon Codes

Working Golf Range Tycoon Codes

  • HOLEINONE - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.

Expired Golf Range Tycoon Codes

There are currently no expired Golf Range Tycoon codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Golf Range Tycoon codes is probably the only good way to earn Cash quickly from the very beginning of the game. So, if you have just started playing and don't want to spend too much time on probably the most difficult part - the beginning of the game with zero capital, redeeming codes is exactly what you need.

How to Redeem Codes for Golf Range Tycoon

Redeeming Golf Range Tycoon codes will take you a few clicks because the developers have made this option easy and accessible. If you have never redeemed a Roblox code before and don't know or understand how it works, please use our guide:

  • Launch Golf Range Tycoon .
  • Pay attention to the lower right corner of the screen. There will be a button labeled Redeem Code. Click on it.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a green Claim button next to it. Now, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Claim button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the right side of the screen with a list of rewards you have received.

How to Get More Golf Range Tycoon Codes

All codes for this Roblox game are first published on the game's official social media pages. Here, developers usually share them along with important announcements or to reward community activity. To save you time, here are all the links:

  • Official Golf Range Tycoon Roblox group.
  • Official Golf Range Tycoon Discord server.
  • Official Golf Range Tycoon X account.
  • Official Golf Range Tycoon YouTube channel.
